column4: hi everyone, i created a new user but i can't log with a gnome session, i saw the debug file and it said that i didn't have permission to write in some folder....can you help me?

hi everyone, i created a new user but i can't log with a gnome session, i saw the debug file and it said that i didn't have permission to write in some folder....can you help me?          <----------------------------->     sry for quoting myself but i think no one read this stuff :D
Does that user have access to it's /home folder?
i don't know, how to see it? and how to give him access?
